entityId.localType: State Records Authority of New South Wales Series Number

biogHist.abstract: Immigration Files is a series of records relating to child migrants who were placed in institutions in New South Wales. They comprise records such as correspondence between Commonwealth departments, relevant charitable institutions and State government departments, including the Immigration Division of the Chief Secretary's Department, the Department of Tourist Activities and the Treasury. The subjects dealt with are child migration to Australia and the funding of the hostels to house them.
biogHist.p: Access to some records in this series may be restricted to protect personal privacy.
These files consist of 1 box of records, which includes the following:

cpfRelation.relationEntry: Records relating to Child and Youth Migration, New South Wales (c. 1919 - c. 1974)
